about.title: About Me
about.name: Eita Horishita
about.introduction: I am a technical research expert specializing in geospatial information and urban environment fields. In my current position, I have over 30 major project experiences in technology strategy development support for private companies on themes such as autonomous driving and decarbonization. In my previous position, I experienced more than 10 technical cooperation projects for GIS and urban infrastructure management commissioned by international organizations such as JICA and the World Bank. Additionally, I develop region-specific web map applications as part of civic activities and actively contribute to open source communities. I can provide insights that contribute to development strategies through technological innovation toward realizing a sustainable society. Please feel free to contact me.
about.brief_history: After graduating from Chiba University Faculty of Engineering, I obtained a Master's degree in International Development from the University of Birmingham, UK. Currently, I work at VALUENEX Japan, engaged in technology trend analysis and strategic support services for private companies.
